weather.page_subtitle: Check real-time weather and climate information for destinations worldwide
weather.tip_1_desc: Check historical weather data to plan your trip during the most suitable season for your activities
weather.tip_2_desc: Bring appropriate clothing for local climate - layers work best for variable weather conditions
weather.tip_3_desc: Off-peak seasons may have lower prices but check if they coincide with monsoons or heavy rainfall

europe.best_months: May-September: Warm weather, long daylight hours, ideal for sightseeing
europe.peak_season: June-August: High tourist traffic, premium prices, crowded attractions
europe.off_season: November-March: Cold weather, fewer tourists, better deals on accommodation
europe.weather_tips: Pack layers for variable weather. Northern Europe stays cool even in summer. Mediterranean regions are hot and dry in peak season. Winter brings snow to mountains and central/northern areas.

asia.best_months: October-April: Cool and dry weather across most regions, perfect for exploration
asia.peak_season: December-February: Comfortable temperatures, major festivals, higher prices
asia.off_season: June-September: Monsoon season in South/Southeast Asia, fewer tourists, lower prices
asia.weather_tips: Avoid monsoon months unless you enjoy rain. Pack light breathable clothes for tropical areas. Higher altitudes in Himalayas require warm clothing. Check local festivals for unique experiences.

north_america.best_months: April-October: Pleasant weather, accessible attractions, outdoor activities
north_america.peak_season: June-August: Summer vacation season, national parks peak, higher accommodation costs
north_america.off_season: November-March: Cold winter weather, ski season in mountains, lower prices except holidays
north_america.weather_tips: Weather varies dramatically by region. Southern areas stay warm year-round while northern regions have harsh winters. Hurricane season (June-November) affects coastal areas. Desert regions are extremely hot in summer.

south_america.best_months: September-November & March-May: Shoulder seasons with good weather and fewer crowds
south_america.peak_season: December-February: Summer in southern hemisphere, beaches popular, Carnival season
south_america.off_season: June-August: Winter in southern regions, rainy season in some areas, budget-friendly
south_america.weather_tips: Seasons are opposite to northern hemisphere. Andean regions have distinct wet/dry seasons. Amazon basin is hot and humid year-round. Patagonia is best visited December-March. Altitude can affect weather significantly.

oceania.best_months: September-May: Spring and summer, warm weather, perfect for beaches and outdoor activities
oceania.peak_season: December-February: Australian summer, school holidays, premium prices
oceania.off_season: June-August: Winter season, cooler weather, great for skiing in New Zealand
oceania.weather_tips: Summer (Dec-Feb) can be very hot in Australia. Northern regions are tropical with wet season Nov-April. New Zealand weather changes quickly - pack for all conditions. UV rays are strong - bring sunscreen.

africa.best_months: May-October: Dry season, best wildlife viewing, comfortable temperatures
africa.peak_season: July-October: Safari peak season, migration viewing, higher costs
africa.off_season: November-April: Wet season, hot and humid, fewer tourists, budget prices
africa.weather_tips: Dry season (May-Oct) is best for safaris as animals gather at water sources. North Africa is hot in summer, pleasant in spring/fall. Coastal areas have Mediterranean climates. Bring sun protection and insect repellent.

caribbean.best_months: December-April: Dry season, warm temperatures, calm seas, ideal beach weather
caribbean.peak_season: December-March: Winter escape season, high demand, premium prices
caribbean.off_season: June-November: Hurricane season, hot and humid, significant discounts
caribbean.weather_tips: Hurricane season (June-Nov) brings risk of storms but also lowest prices. Trade winds provide cooling breezes. Tropical showers are brief but intense. Pack light summer clothes and rain gear. Water temperature stays warm year-round.

climate_zones.coastal_desert_desc: Dry coastal regions with mild temperatures
climate_zones.tropical_desc: Hot and humid with frequent rainfall
climate_zones.highland_desc: Cool mountain regions with variable weather

seasons.dry_season_desc: Less rainfall, ideal for outdoor activities

tips.altitude_considerations_desc: Higher altitudes may cause altitude sickness

help.title: Help Center
help.subtitle: Find answers to common questions and get help using GlobeMate

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Find answers to the most common questions

trip_planning.question: How do I plan a trip with GlobeMate?
trip_planning.answer: Start by selecting a destination, budget, and dates. Our system will create a personalized itinerary with AI-powered recommendations.

budget_tracking.question: How do I track my expenses?
budget_tracking.answer: Use our budget tracker to record expenses, set budgets, and view visual analytics of your trip spending.

community.question: What is the GlobeMate community?
community.answer: Join our community to share experiences, connect with fellow travelers, and get local travel tips.

destinations.question: How do I search for destinations?
destinations.answer: Browse our destinations hub, filter by continent or country, and discover detailed information about each place.

account.question: How do I manage my account?
account.answer: Access your account settings to update personal details, preferences, and security information.

languages.question: What languages are supported?
languages.answer: GlobeMate is available in Hebrew and English. Switch languages anytime through the language selector.

help.contact_description: Can't find what you're looking for? Contact us and we'll be happy to help.

intro.title: Introduction
intro.content: At GlobeMate, we are committed to protecting your privacy. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.

collection.title: Information Collection
collection.content:
We collect information you provide directly, such as:
‚Ä¢ Name, email, and phone number
‚Ä¢ Travel preferences and trip plans
‚Ä¢ Payment information (secured)
‚Ä¢ Content you share in the community

usage.title: Information Usage
usage.content:
We use your information to:
‚Ä¢ Provide and improve our services
‚Ä¢ Personalize your travel experience
‚Ä¢ Communicate with you about your account and trips
‚Ä¢ Enhance platform security

sharing.title: Information Sharing
sharing.content:
We do not sell or rent your personal information. We may share information only:
‚Ä¢ With your explicit consent
‚Ä¢ With trusted service providers
‚Ä¢ When required by law

security.title: Information Security
security.content:
We use advanced security measures including:
‚Ä¢ SSL/TLS encryption
‚Ä¢ Secure database storage
‚Ä¢ Limited access controls
‚Ä¢ Continuous security monitoring

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.content:
We use cookies to:
‚Ä¢ Improve user experience
‚Ä¢ Analyze site usage
‚Ä¢ Save preferences
You can manage cookie preferences in your browser settings.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.content:
You have the right to:
‚Ä¢ Access your personal information
‚Ä¢ Correct inaccurate information
‚Ä¢ Delete your account
‚Ä¢ Withdraw consent at any time
‚Ä¢ File a complaint with the privacy authority

children.title: Children's Privacy
children.content: Our services are not intended for children under 13. We do not knowingly collect information from children.

changes.title: Policy Changes
changes.content: We may update this policy from time to time. We will notify you of significant changes via email or site notice.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content:
For questions about this privacy policy, contact:
support@globemate.co.il
0525530454

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing and using GlobeMate services, you agree to these terms of service. If you disagree, please do not use our services.

services.title: Service Description
services.content:
GlobeMate provides:
‚Ä¢ AI-powered trip planning
‚Ä¢ Budget tracking
‚Ä¢ Traveler community
‚Ä¢ Destination information
‚Ä¢ Travel coordination tools

account.title: User Account
account.content:
You are responsible for:
‚Ä¢ Maintaining account confidentiality
‚Ä¢ All activity on your account
‚Ä¢ Reporting unauthorized use
‚Ä¢ Providing accurate and current information

user_content.title: User Content
user_content.content:
You retain ownership of your content but grant us a license to use it for service improvement. You are responsible for ensuring your content does not:
‚Ä¢ Infringe copyrights
‚Ä¢ Contain offensive or illegal material
‚Ä¢ Contain viruses or malicious software

prohibited.title: Prohibited Uses
prohibited.content:
You may not:
‚Ä¢ Use the service for illegal purposes
‚Ä¢ Violate others' privacy
‚Ä¢ Upload malicious content
‚Ä¢ Copy or duplicate the service
‚Ä¢ Harass other users

intellectual.title: Intellectual Property
intellectual.content: All GlobeMate content and technology are protected by copyrights and trademarks. You may not use them without explicit permission.

third_party.title: Third-Party Services
third_party.content: Our service may include links to third-party sites. We are not responsible for the content or privacy of these sites.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
disclaimer.content:
The service is provided 'as is'. We do not guarantee:
‚Ä¢ Continuous availability
‚Ä¢ Absolute accuracy of information
‚Ä¢ Fitness for specific purposes
Use the service at your own risk.

limitation.title: Limitation of Liability
limitation.content:
GlobeMate will not be liable for:
‚Ä¢ Indirect or consequential damages
‚Ä¢ Loss of profits or information
‚Ä¢ Damages arising from use or inability to use

termination.title: Termination
termination.content:
We reserve the right to:
‚Ä¢ Suspend or close accounts
‚Ä¢ Discontinue the service
‚Ä¢ Change the terms
In case of violation of these terms.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.content: We may update these terms. Continued use after changes constitutes acceptance of updated terms.

governing.title: Governing Law
governing.content: These terms are governed by Israeli law. Exclusive jurisdiction is granted to Israeli courts.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content:
For questions about these terms:
support@globemate.co.il
0525530454

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: GlobeMate is an innovative travel planning platform that combines artificial intelligence with a vibrant community of travelers.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: To make travel planning easy, accessible, and enjoyable for everyone. We combine advanced AI technology with community knowledge to create personalized travel experiences.

global.title: Global Thinking
global.description: We believe travel brings cultures together and broadens horizons.

community.title: Community
community.description: The strength of our community lies in its diversity and shared experiences.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We use advanced technology to create smart travel solutions.

passion.title: Travel Passion
passion.description: Our passion for exploring the world drives us to be the best.

story.title: Our Story
story.paragraph1: GlobeMate was founded on the belief that trip planning should be simple and enjoyable. We saw travelers spending countless hours searching for information, deliberating, and comparing options.
story.paragraph2: We decided to create a platform that combines the power of artificial intelligence with community wisdom. Our technology learns from user preferences and provides personalized recommendations, while the community shares real experiences and tips.
story.paragraph3: Today, GlobeMate serves travelers in 70+ countries, provides support in multiple languages, and helps thousands plan their dream trips.

cta.title: Let's Connect
cta.description: Have questions or ideas? We'd love to hear from you!
